text: Ekhana musarekara balabeh yadi allaha iccha karatena, tabe na amara siraka karatama, na amadera bapa dadara ebam na amara kona bastuke harama karatama. Emanibhabe tadera purbabartira mithyaropa kareche, emana ki tara amara sasti asbadana kareche. Apani balunah tomadera kache ki kona pramana ache ya amaderake dekhate para. Tomara sudhumatra andajera anusarana kara ebam tomara sudhu anumana kare katha bala.
